metadata.command: ssp.py recognize --components sandbox/known-components.json --model sandbox/components-model --catalog NIST_SP-800-171_rev1 sandbox/file.txt
ssp.py recognize --components sandbox/known-components.json --model sandbox/components-model --catalog NIST_SP-800-171_rev1 sandbox/file2.txt

3.1.2.text: Limit system access to functions that authorized users are permitted by security groups.

3.1.10.text: Company uses the Microsoft Active Directory (AD) Group Policy Object (GPO) to control screen saver timeout and length of time of idle time before the screen saver is enabled.
